00064    networking / disk / timings affected by load (use Adaptive Timeouts) */

00080 /* Some hash init argument constants */
00081 #define HASH_POOLS_BKT_BITS 3
00082 #define HASH_POOLS_CUR_BITS 3
00083 #define HASH_POOLS_MAX_BITS 7
00084 #define HASH_UUID_BKT_BITS 5
00085 #define HASH_UUID_CUR_BITS 7
00086 #define HASH_UUID_MAX_BITS 12
00087 #define HASH_NID_BKT_BITS 5
00088 #define HASH_NID_CUR_BITS 7
00089 #define HASH_NID_MAX_BITS 12
00090 #define HASH_NID_STATS_BKT_BITS 5
00091 #define HASH_NID_STATS_CUR_BITS 7
00092 #define HASH_NID_STATS_MAX_BITS 12
00093 #define HASH_GEN_BKT_BITS 5
00094 #define HASH_GEN_CUR_BITS 7
00095 #define HASH_GEN_MAX_BITS 12
00096 #define HASH_LQE_BKT_BITS 5
00097 #define HASH_LQE_CUR_BITS 7
00098 #define HASH_LQE_MAX_BITS 12
00099 #define HASH_CONN_BKT_BITS 5
00100 #define HASH_CONN_CUR_BITS 5
00101 #define HASH_CONN_MAX_BITS 15
00102 #define HASH_EXP_LOCK_BKT_BITS  5
00103 #define HASH_EXP_LOCK_CUR_BITS  7
00104 #define HASH_EXP_LOCK_MAX_BITS  16
00105 #define HASH_CL_ENV_BKT_BITS    5
00106 #define HASH_CL_ENV_BITS        10
00107 #define HASH_JOB_STATS_BKT_BITS 5
00108 #define HASH_JOB_STATS_CUR_BITS 7
00109 #define HASH_JOB_STATS_MAX_BITS 12

00111 /* Timeout definitions */
00112 #define OBD_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT             100
00113 #define LDLM_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT            20
00114 #define MDS_LDLM_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT        6
00115 /* Time to wait for all clients to reconnect during recovery (hard limit) */
00116 #define OBD_RECOVERY_TIME_HARD          (obd_timeout * 9)
00117 /* Time to wait for all clients to reconnect during recovery (soft limit) */
00118 /* Should be very conservative; must catch the first reconnect after reboot */
00119 #define OBD_RECOVERY_TIME_SOFT          (obd_timeout * 3)
00120 /* Change recovery-small 26b time if you change this */
00121 #define PING_INTERVAL max(obd_timeout / 4, 1U)
00122 /* a bit more than maximal journal commit time in seconds */
00123 #define PING_INTERVAL_SHORT min(PING_INTERVAL, 7U)
00124 /* Client may skip 1 ping; we must wait at least 2.5. But for multiple
00125  * failover targets the client only pings one server at a time, and pings
00126  * can be lost on a loaded network. Since eviction has serious consequences,
00127  * and there's no urgent need to evict a client just because it's idle, we
00128  * should be very conservative here. */
00129 #define PING_EVICT_TIMEOUT (PING_INTERVAL * 6)
00130 #define DISK_TIMEOUT 50          /* Beyond this we warn about disk speed */
00131 #define CONNECTION_SWITCH_MIN 5U /* Connection switching rate limiter */
00132  /* Max connect interval for nonresponsive servers; ~50s to avoid building up
00133     connect requests in the LND queues, but within obd_timeout so we don't
00134     miss the recovery window */
00135 #define CONNECTION_SWITCH_MAX min(50U, max(CONNECTION_SWITCH_MIN,obd_timeout))
00136 #define CONNECTION_SWITCH_INC 5  /* Connection timeout backoff */
00137 /* In general this should be low to have quick detection of a system
00138    running on a backup server. (If it's too low, import_select_connection
00139    will increase the timeout anyhow.)  */
00140 #define INITIAL_CONNECT_TIMEOUT max(CONNECTION_SWITCH_MIN,obd_timeout/20)
00141 /* The max delay between connects is SWITCH_MAX + SWITCH_INC + INITIAL */
00142 #define RECONNECT_DELAY_MAX (CONNECTION_SWITCH_MAX + CONNECTION_SWITCH_INC + \
00143                              INITIAL_CONNECT_TIMEOUT)
00144 /* The min time a target should wait for clients to reconnect in recovery */
00145 #define OBD_RECOVERY_TIME_MIN    (2*RECONNECT_DELAY_MAX)
00146 #define OBD_IR_FACTOR_MIN         1
00147 #define OBD_IR_FACTOR_MAX         10
00148 #define OBD_IR_FACTOR_DEFAULT    (OBD_IR_FACTOR_MAX/2)
00149 /* default timeout for the MGS to become IR_FULL */
00150 #define OBD_IR_MGS_TIMEOUT       (4*obd_timeout)
00151 #define LONG_UNLINK 300          /* Unlink should happen before now */
00152 
00157 #define GRANT_SHRINK_INTERVAL            1200/*20 minutes*/

00617 /* Assign references to moved code to reduce code changes */
00618 #define OBD_FAIL_PRECHECK(id)                   CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(id)
00619 #define OBD_FAIL_CHECK(id)                      CFS_FAIL_CHECK(id)
00620 #define OBD_FAIL_CHECK_VALUE(id, value)         CFS_FAIL_CHECK_VALUE(id, value)
00621 #define OBD_FAIL_CHECK_ORSET(id, value)         CFS_FAIL_CHECK_ORSET(id, value)
00622 #define OBD_FAIL_CHECK_RESET(id, value)         CFS_FAIL_CHECK_RESET(id, value)
00623 #define OBD_FAIL_RETURN(id, ret)                CFS_FAIL_RETURN(id, ret)
00624 #define OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(id, secs)              CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(id, secs)
00625 #define OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT_MS(id, ms)             CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_MS(id, ms)
00626 #define OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT_ORSET(id, value, secs) CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_ORSET(id, value, secs)
00627 #define OBD_RACE(id)                            CFS_RACE(id)

00631 #define LUT_FAIL_CLASS(fail_id)                 (((fail_id) >> 8) << 16)
00632 #define LUT_FAIL_MGT                            LUT_FAIL_CLASS(OBD_FAIL_MGS)
00633 #define LUT_FAIL_MDT                            LUT_FAIL_CLASS(OBD_FAIL_MDS)
00634 #define LUT_FAIL_OST                            LUT_FAIL_CLASS(OBD_FAIL_OST)
00635 
00636 extern atomic_t libcfs_kmemory;
00637 
00638 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00639 #define obd_memory_add(size)                                                  \
00640         lprocfs_counter_add(obd_memory, OBD_MEMORY_STAT, (long)(size))
00641 #define obd_memory_sub(size)                                                  \
00642         lprocfs_counter_sub(obd_memory, OBD_MEMORY_STAT, (long)(size))
00643 #define obd_memory_sum()                                                      \
00644         lprocfs_stats_collector(obd_memory, OBD_MEMORY_STAT,                  \
00645                                 LPROCFS_FIELDS_FLAGS_SUM)
00646 
00647 extern void obd_update_maxusage(void);
00648 extern __u64 obd_memory_max(void);
00649 
00650 #else /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00651 
00652 extern __u64 obd_alloc;
00653 
00654 extern __u64 obd_max_alloc;
00655 
00656 static inline void obd_memory_add(long size)
00657 {
00658         obd_alloc += size;
00659         if (obd_alloc > obd_max_alloc)
00660                 obd_max_alloc = obd_alloc;
00661 }
00662 
00663 static inline void obd_memory_sub(long size)
00664 {
00665         obd_alloc -= size;
00666 }
00667 
00668 #define obd_memory_sum() (obd_alloc)
00669 
00670 #define obd_memory_max() (obd_max_alloc)
00671 
00672 #endif /* !CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00673 
00674 #define OBD_DEBUG_MEMUSAGE (1)
00675 
00676 #if OBD_DEBUG_MEMUSAGE
00677 #define OBD_ALLOC_POST(ptr, size, name)                                 \
00678                 obd_memory_add(size);                                   \
00679                 CDEBUG(D_MALLOC, name " '" #ptr "': %d at %p.\n",       \
00680                        (int)(size), ptr)
00681 
00682 #define OBD_FREE_PRE(ptr, size, name)                                   \
00683         LASSERT(ptr);                                                   \
00684         obd_memory_sub(size);                                           \
00685         CDEBUG(D_MALLOC, name " '" #ptr "': %d at %p.\n",               \
00686                (int)(size), ptr);                                       \
00687         POISON(ptr, 0x5a, size)
00688 
00689 #else /* !OBD_DEBUG_MEMUSAGE */
00690 
00691 #define OBD_ALLOC_POST(ptr, size, name) ((void)0)
00692 #define OBD_FREE_PRE(ptr, size, name)   ((void)0)
00693 
00694 #endif /* !OBD_DEBUG_MEMUSAGE */
00695 
00696 #define __OBD_MALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, cptab, cpt, size, flags)                    \
00697 do {                                                                          \
00698         (ptr) = (cptab) == NULL ?                                             \
00699                 kmalloc(size, (flags) | __GFP_ZERO) :                         \
00700                 cfs_cpt_malloc(cptab, cpt, size, (flags) | __GFP_ZERO);       \
00701         if (likely((ptr) != NULL))                                            \
00702                 OBD_ALLOC_POST(ptr, size, "kmalloced");                       \
00703 } while (0)
00704 
00705 #define OBD_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, size, gfp_mask)                                    \
00706         __OBD_MALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, NULL, 0, size, gfp_mask)
00707 
00708 #define OBD_ALLOC(ptr, size) OBD_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, size, GFP_NOFS)
00709 #define OBD_ALLOC_WAIT(ptr, size) OBD_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, size, GFP_KERNEL)
00710 #define OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ptr) OBD_ALLOC(ptr, sizeof *(ptr))
00711 #define OBD_ALLOC_PTR_WAIT(ptr) OBD_ALLOC_WAIT(ptr, sizeof *(ptr))
00712 
00713 #define OBD_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, cptab, cpt, size, gfp_mask)                    \
00714         __OBD_MALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, cptab, cpt, size, gfp_mask)
00715 
00716 #define OBD_CPT_ALLOC(ptr, cptab, cpt, size)                                  \
00717         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, cptab, cpt, size, GFP_NOFS)
00718 
00719 #define OBD_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(ptr, cptab, cpt)                                    \
00720         OBD_CPT_ALLOC(ptr, cptab, cpt, sizeof *(ptr))
00721 
00722 /* Direct use of __vmalloc() allows for protection flag specification
00723  * (and particularly to not set __GFP_FS, which is likely to cause some
00724  * deadlock situations in our code).
00725  */
00726 #define __OBD_VMALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, cptab, cpt, size)                          \
00727 do {                                                                          \
00728         (ptr) = cptab == NULL ?                                               \
00729                 __vmalloc(size, GFP_NOFS | __GFP_HIGHMEM | __GFP_ZERO,        \
00730                           PAGE_KERNEL) :                                      \
00731                 cfs_cpt_vzalloc(cptab, cpt, size);                            \
00732         if (unlikely((ptr) == NULL)) {                                        \
00733                 CERROR("vmalloc of '" #ptr "' (%d bytes) failed\n",           \
00734                        (int)(size));                                          \
00735                 CERROR(LPU64" total bytes allocated by Lustre, %d by LNET\n", \
00736                        obd_memory_sum(), atomic_read(&libcfs_kmemory));       \
00737         } else {                                                              \
00738                 OBD_ALLOC_POST(ptr, size, "vmalloced");                       \
00739         }                                                                     \
00740 } while(0)
00741 
00742 #define OBD_VMALLOC(ptr, size)                                                \
00743          __OBD_VMALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, NULL, 0, size)
00744 #define OBD_CPT_VMALLOC(ptr, cptab, cpt, size)                                \
00745          __OBD_VMALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, cptab, cpt, size)
00746 
00747 #define OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(ptr, size)                                            \
00748 do {                                                                          \
00749         OBD_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, size, GFP_NOFS | __GFP_NOWARN);                    \
00750         if (ptr == NULL)                                                      \
00751                 OBD_VMALLOC(ptr, size);                                       \
00752 } while (0)
00753 
00754 #define OBD_CPT_ALLOC_LARGE(ptr, cptab, cpt, size)                            \
00755 do {                                                                          \
00756         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, cptab, cpt, size, GFP_NOFS | __GFP_NOWARN);    \
00757         if (ptr == NULL)                                                      \
00758                 OBD_CPT_VMALLOC(ptr, cptab, cpt, size);                       \
00759 } while (0)
00760 
00761 #ifdef CONFIG_DEBUG_SLAB
00762 #define POISON(ptr, c, s) do {} while (0)
00763 #define POISON_PTR(ptr)  ((void)0)
00764 #else
00765 #define POISON(ptr, c, s) memset(ptr, c, s)
00766 #define POISON_PTR(ptr)  (ptr) = (void *)0xdeadbeef
00767 #endif
00768 
00769 #ifdef POISON_BULK
00770 #define POISON_PAGE(page, val) do { memset(kmap(page), val, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE); \
00771                                     kunmap(page); } while (0)
00772 #else
00773 #define POISON_PAGE(page, val) do { } while (0)
00774 #endif
00775 
00776 #define OBD_FREE(ptr, size)                                                   \
00777 do {                                                                          \
00778         OBD_FREE_PRE(ptr, size, "kfreed");                                    \
00779         kfree(ptr);                                                           \
00780         POISON_PTR(ptr);                                                      \
00781 } while (0)
00782 
00783 #define OBD_FREE_LARGE(ptr, size)                                             \
00784 do {                                                                          \
00785         if (is_vmalloc_addr(ptr)) {                                           \
00786                 OBD_FREE_PRE(ptr, size, "vfreed");                            \
00787                 vfree(ptr);                                                   \
00788                 POISON_PTR(ptr);                                              \
00789         } else {                                                              \
00790                 OBD_FREE(ptr, size);                                          \
00791         }                                                                     \
00792 } while (0)
00793 
00794 #define OBD_FREE_RCU(ptr, size, handle)                                       \
00795 do {                                                                          \
00796         struct portals_handle *__h = (handle);                                \
00797                                                                               \
00798         LASSERT(handle != NULL);                                              \
00799         __h->h_cookie = (unsigned long)(ptr);                                 \
00800         __h->h_size = (size);                                                 \
00801         call_rcu(&__h->h_rcu, class_handle_free_cb);                          \
00802         POISON_PTR(ptr);                                                      \
00803 } while(0)
00804 
00805 /* we memset() the slab object to 0 when allocation succeeds, so DO NOT
00806  * HAVE A CTOR THAT DOES ANYTHING.  its work will be cleared here.  we'd
00807  * love to assert on that, but slab.c keeps kmem_cache_s all to itself. */
00808 #define OBD_SLAB_FREE_RTN0(ptr, slab)                                         \
00809 ({                                                                            \
00810         kmem_cache_free((slab), (ptr));                                    \
00811         (ptr) = NULL;                                                         \
00812         0;                                                                    \
00813 })
00814 
00815 #define __OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, size, type)           \
00816 do {                                                                          \
00817         LASSERT(ergo((type) != GFP_ATOMIC, !in_interrupt()));                 \
00818         (ptr) = (cptab) == NULL ?                                             \
00819                 kmem_cache_alloc(slab, (type) | __GFP_ZERO) :                 \
00820                 cfs_mem_cache_cpt_alloc(slab, cptab, cpt, (type) | __GFP_ZERO); \
00821         if (likely((ptr)))                                                    \
00822                 OBD_ALLOC_POST(ptr, size, "slab-alloced");                    \
00823 } while(0)
00824 
00825 #define OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, size, flags)                            \
00826         __OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, slab, NULL, 0, size, flags)
00827 #define OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, size, flags)            \
00828         __OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_VERBOSE(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, size, flags)
00829 
00830 #define OBD_FREE_PTR(ptr) OBD_FREE(ptr, sizeof *(ptr))
00831 
00832 #define OBD_SLAB_FREE(ptr, slab, size)                                        \
00833 do {                                                                          \
00834         OBD_FREE_PRE(ptr, size, "slab-freed");                                \
00835         kmem_cache_free(slab, ptr);                                        \
00836         POISON_PTR(ptr);                                                      \
00837 } while(0)
00838 
00839 #define OBD_SLAB_ALLOC(ptr, slab, size)                                       \
00840         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, size, GFP_NOFS)
00841 
00842 #define OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, size)                       \
00843         OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, size, GFP_NOFS)
00844 
00845 #define OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(ptr, slab)                                         \
00846         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC(ptr, slab, sizeof *(ptr))
00847 
00848 #define OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt)                         \
00849         OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, sizeof *(ptr))
00850 
00851 #define OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(ptr, slab, flags)                              \
00852         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, sizeof *(ptr), flags)
00853 
00854 #define OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, flags)                      \
00855         OBD_SLAB_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(ptr, slab, cptab, cpt, sizeof *(ptr), flags)
00856 
00857 #define OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(ptr, slab)                                          \
00858         OBD_SLAB_FREE((ptr), (slab), sizeof *(ptr))
00859 
00860 #define KEY_IS(str) \
00861         (keylen >= (sizeof(str)-1) && memcmp(key, str, (sizeof(str)-1)) == 0)
00862 
00863 #endif
